snippet.title: Where the Heart Leads "Choice" Trailer
snippet.description:
Where the Heart Leads
One person's journey through a lifetime of choices.
And for every choice... a consequence.

Coming to PS4 Q2 2021
Playable on PS5

http://armature.com/games/where-the-heart-leads
https://www.instagram.com/wheretheheartisgame/
https://twitter.com/ArmatureStudio
